Start by grabbing a few single layer 2x4 Lego connectors...
...and punch a small hole through the back side by any means necessary.
Now, grab your keys and slide that small Lego over the key ring and nestle it into place.
Now, get a large block connector and apply some strong double-sided adhesive to the back.
Take the block and mount it firmly to a wall, making sure the adhesive has fully taken hold.
Now, you've got yourself a simple Lego key rack.
Plug them in every time you come home and never lose your keys again.
